content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Answer (a), (b), and (c).

Briefly describe ONE element of the Compromise of 1850.

Briefly explain ONE specific historical reason why the United States government agreed to the Compromise of 1850.

Briefly describe ONE key historical similarity or difference between the Compromise of 1850 and the Missouri Compromise.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
